contentrichtext.text: {{Taxobox |image = Bunopus crassicauda.jpeg |image_caption = ''[[Bunopus crassicauda]]'' | regnum = [[Animal]]ia | phylum = [[Chordate|Chordata]] | classis = [[Reptile|Reptilia]] | ordo = [[Squamata]] | familia = [[Gekkonidae]] | subfamilia = [[Gekkoninae]] | genus = '''''Bunopus''''' | genus_authority = [[William Thomas Blanford|Blanford]], 1874</small> | range_map = Bunopus sp. distribution.png | subdivision_ranks = Species | subdivision = See text. }} '''Bunopus''' is a [[genus]] of small [[gecko]]s or [[lizard]]s found in many sites around the world. ==Classification of genus Bunopus== *Blanford's Ground Gecko, ''[[Bunopus blanfordii]]''<ref>[http://herpetology.com/ywfig6.html Bulletin of the Philadelphia Herpetological Society, Vol. 31 (ISSN 0553-9587)]</ref> *Thickhead Rock Gecko, ''[[Bunopus crassicauda]]'' *Spacious Rock Gecko, ''[[Bunopus spatalurus]]'' *Baluch Rock Gecko, ''[[Bunopus tuberculatus]]'' ==References== <references/> ==External links== *[http://herpetology.com/1phs31.html Gekkonid Lizards from Five Quarters Meet in Israel] *{{Wikispecies-inline}} [[Category:Geckos]] {{gecko-stub}}
